metadata.title: CVE-2017-16646 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
drivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/dib0700_devices.c in the Linux kernel through4.13.11 allows local users to cause a denial of service (BUG and systemcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted USB device.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16646` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-lowlatency - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1053-snapdragon - 4.15.0-1053.57
No subscription required
